value:
There are ninja dojos near Hoshido,
you know—in the countries of
Mokushu and Kohga.

Teamwork isn't exactly my forte.
But I make up for it by being so
capable on my own!

I wish this cherry-blossom pattern
were a little flashier, but that'd make
it harder to sneak around.

In this outfit, even the smallest tear
will become a big gash. Good thing
I always carry a needle and thread!

This steamed bun is from a ninja
ration that Saizo gave me. Want
a bite? It's good, I promise!

Psst! I got a secret message for you
from $Nf!$k$pWhaddaya think? Am I an impressive
ninja or what?!
I never miss an opening!

What are you looking at? You're
wide open!

Don't blame me! It's the shuriken—
they're not flying straight!

I'm one step closer to becoming a
master.

Hey, my name's Hana! I traded in my
usual samurai outfit for ninja robes.

What do you think? Would you say
that I've become a master ninja yet?$k$pSee, when I first heard about this
festival I thought: There's no way
I can be a ninja!$k$pI didn't know how to throw shuriken,
didn't know the first thing about
stealth combat.$k$pBut it turns out, being a samurai isn't
so different from being a ninja! It all
comes down to dedication.$k$pThere's someone I want to protect.
Whether I'm a samurai or ninja or
whatever else, I will protect them!$k$pWith everything I've learned at this
festival, I'm sure to be even better
at keeping them safe.
はいっ
覚悟！
きゃあっ
油断したわ…
Bow before the blade!
Target eliminated.
Ninja strike! Right?
You're mine now!
No...not yet...
えへっ
I am Hana of Hoshido. I may not be wielding my katana, but my form is still first-rate!
Oh! You must have the silent footsteps of a ninja to sneak up on me like that.
Hoshido's ninja are masters of their art...but who's to say a samurai can't learn their trade, too?
I need to continue training hard and learning all I can, so I may always keep Lady Sakura safe!
Throwing a shuriken is a lot harder than it looks...but check THIS out!
The garb of a ninja is different from what I'm used to. I'll ask Kagero's advice.
I can serve you as a ninja, but only when I appear as one… I hope you have many tasks for me!
I'm in!
Where to next?
Not a problem.
